name: Tokimeki no Houkago: Ne Quiz Siyo
overview: A trivia game featuring characters from first PlayStation Tokimeki Memorial title (the second of two games like this - the first was Tokimeki Memorial Private Collection.) Choose a girl and answer trivia questions about pop culture to try to win her heart. You can also, in an odd twist, play with the boy Saotome Yoshio, although you don't win his heart (too bad, ladies -- you'll have to wait for Girl's Side to romance the boys) -- instead, you both commit to finding a girlfriend. As usual in the Tokimeki series this game also have mini games but with the difference that in this game the mini games are also played answering questions, if the player answer them in the right way he will win the mini game.
